DOC.brief_summary: - To assess tolerability safety single injection Influenza VLP Vaccine administer intramuscularly ( IM ) 15 µg 60 µg HA per strain . - To assess immunogenicity Influenza VLP Vaccine administer 15 µg 60 µg HA per strain measure hemagglutination inhibition ( HAI ) antibody titer component viral strain [ A/Brisbane/59/2007 ( H1N1 ) ; A/Brisbane/10/2007 ( H3N2 ) B/Brisbane/60/2008 ] .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Safety Immunogenicity Seasonal Influenza Virus-Like Particle ( VLP ) Vaccine Older Adults
